188460.「もう 会ってると思うけど 紹介するよ。\n ダルル盗賊団の新入り ピンチョだよ:
I'm sure you've met him by now, but allow me
to introduce you. Pincho, the newest member of
the Darul Thieves!

188461.「あ…あの時は どうも……。\n 僕 ピンチョって いいます。: Oh...thanks for that time...my name is Pincho.

188462.「キ キミは 怪盗ポイックリンを どう思う？\n 彼女のような存在こそ 今の世界:
Ki, what do you think of Phantom Thief
Poiclin? Don't you think she's the kind of
hero the world needs right now?<yesno><close>

188463.「アッ そうか！ ヒーローじゃなくて\n ヒロインだって 言いたいんだね！\n:
Oh, yeah! You're trying to tell me that she's
a heroine, not a hero! But to me, she's a
hero!

188464.「そうだよね！ キミはいい人だね！\n お 同じ気持ちを持つ 仲間に出会えて\n:
You're right! You're a good man! I'm so glad
you found a like-minded companion!

188465.「漆黒のスーツの マントをひるがえし\n 夜の町を駆け抜ける 正義の怪盗……。\:
A thief with a jet-black suit, fluttering his cape and running through the city at night, a thief of justice... I longed to look like
that, so I tried to imitate him!

188466.「コイツの着てる衣装 型紙から\n 自分で作ったんだってよ。小道具も全部。\n:
He made the costume he's wearing by himself,
from the paper pattern. All the props too. He
really is hard-core...

188467.「ま ちょいと 変わったヤツだけど\n 正義を愛する心意気は 人一倍だからね。\:
Well, he's a bit of an oddball, but he loves
justice more than anyone else. That's why I
bought him!

188468.「だ だけど……最近 ポイックリンが\n 悪質な方法で 荒稼ぎしてるって\n 言:
But...lately there have been reports that
Poiclin has been making a lot of money through
nefarious means.

188469.「僕 絶対に そんなハズないって\n 思ったんだ！ だから 直接会って\n 事情:
I thought to myself, "That can't be true! So I
went to see him and asked him what happened...

188470.「そこで アンタに はち合わせたんだとさ。\n まったく 人騒がせな ヤツだよ。:
That's where he ran into you. He's a real
scandalous fellow, isn't he?

188471.「とりあえず 極悪非道の冷血怪盗と呼ばれている\n ポイックリンが ニセモノだと:
At any rate, I'm glad that Phantom Thief Poiclin, as the diabolical cold-blooded thief is called, turned out to be a phony. I'll let
my companions know.

188472.「協力してくれて ありがとう。\n さあ 今回の報酬を受け取っておくれ！\n:
Thanks for your help. Now go on and receive
your reward this time!

188473.「だ…ダークポイックリンは\n これは ふ…復讐だって 言ってた……。: Dark Poiclin said this was revenge.

188474.「だ…だから アイツは まだ何か\n 悪事を 働こうとしているのかもしれない。\:
So...maybe he's still trying to do something
evil. Well...we have to catch him quickly
before that happens!

188475.「ぼ…僕は アイツの 手がかりがないか\n 調べておくよ。何かわかったら\n 連:
I'll keep checking to see if there are any
clues about him. I'll let you know if I find
anything.

188476.「フン。ずいぶん あっけなく 捕まったものネ。\n さぁ 人様のモノを盗む その:
Hmm. You were caught so easily. Now, let's see
how shallow you are to steal someone's things.

188477.「ハァ！？ オメー 誰だよ！\n もしかして ニセモノかッ！？\n いくらなんで:
Huh? Who are you? Could it be a fake? The
quality is so low!

188478.「びょぇえええええええ！！\n ごめんなさい ゴメンナサイぃいいい！\n い い:
Beeeeeeee!! I'm sorry, I'm so sorry!! No, no,
Just save my life, please!!

188479.「チッ……わざわざ アシ運んで ソンしたわ。\n コイツを 王立騎士団のヤツらに:
Damn...I'm sorry I went to all the trouble to
carry that reed. Let's turn him in to the
Royal Knights and get the hell out of here...

188481.「天知る！ 地知る！ 人ぞ知る！: Know the sky! The earth knows! Man knows!

188483.「それでは皆さん……ごきげんよう。: Well then, everyone...have a nice day.

188485.「フーン。コッチは よくできてんじゃない。: Hmm. This one is well done.

188486.「なっ……なんですの アナタ！？\n どうやって ここに……。: What are you doing? How did you get in here?

188487.「アンタさぁ……いったい 誰の許可取って\n こんな 茶番やってるワケ？:
You... who gave you the permission to do this
farce?

188489.「天知る 地知る 人ぞ知る…………: Heaven knows, earth knows, man knows...

188490.「真の美少女怪盗ポイックリン！\n 華麗に 参上でございますわっ！:
The true beauty, Phantom Thief Poiclin! Here
she comes in all her splendor!

188491.「さぁ ニセモノ！\n いさぎよく 正体を現しなさい！: Come on, phony! Reveal yourself with dignity!

188492.「ポ ポ ポイックリン様だぁ～～～～！！\n 超カッコいい～～～～ッ！！:
It's Mr. Popo Poiclin!!! ～～～～!!! Super cool
～～～～!

188493.「我が名は ダークポイックリン……。\n キサマを 奈落の底へ 突き落とす者。:
My name is Dark Poiclin....the one who will
plunge Kisama into the abyss.

188496.「……次は 逃がさないわ。: I won't let you get away next time.

188497.「それでは皆さん ごきげんよう。\n チリも残さず\n キレイに退散ですわっ！:
Well then, have a good day, everyone. We're
leaving here without a speck of Chiri!

188498.どうやら 悪質な手口で 荒稼ぎしていたのは\nポイックリンの ニセモノだったよう:
It seems that it was an imposter of Poiclin who was raking in the cash through malicious means. Let's report this to Darul at the
tavern in Mount Gatara.
